metadata.name: !!~External item descriptions
metadata.description:
This mod displays detailed information about all items, trinkets, cards, runes and pills DIRECTLY onto your screen. Say goodbye to your browsertab with platinumgod open ;)
[h1][b]------------------FEATURES------------------[/b][/h1] - Displays information for all Collectibles, Trinkets, Cards, Runes, Pills and some Rooms - Displays [b]additional informations[/b] like Itemtype, Charges, or Transformations - Display one of 4 different Indicators around the inspected item - Mod support for nearly all mods! - Easy to use API ([url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions/wiki]Documentation here[/url]) - A huge amount of custom options like: ---- Indicators ---- Font style ---- Language ---- and a lot of visual options! - [b]Press F2 to hide/show the descriptions![/b]
[h1][b]------------------LANGUAGES------------------[/b][/h1] [img]https://i.imgur.com/L8924jU.png[/img] [table] [tr] [th]ENGLISH[/th] [th]SPANISH[/th] [th]RUSSIAN[/th] [th]FRENCH[/th] [th]PORTUGUESE[/th] [th]BULGARIAN[/th] [th]TURKISH[/th] [th]POLISH[/th] [/tr] [tr] [td]by Wofsauge[/td] [td]by Arroyo Purroy[/td] [td]by hell2Pay, fly_6 and TrJ-VoRon[/td] [td]by Nicolas Delvaux[/td] [td]by Marcelino Cruz[/td] [td]by TST_Gogo_, Gothika_47[/td] [td]by Mert Dutal[/td] [td]by Rickyy[/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/J72fl8H.png[/img] [b]CHINESE[/b] version: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1290363695]EID Chinese Edition[/url] or alternatively [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=848295251]中文道具图鉴 Eid Chinese[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/s55wxDG.png[/img] [b]ITALIAN[/b] version: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=931392691]External Item Descriptions Italian[/url] --
[h1][b]------------------CONFIGURATION------------------[/b][/h1] [h1]You can use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1603631350]'Mod config Menu'[/url] to customize this mod![/h1] or [b]Windows[/b] 1. Go to ..\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ Mods\External item descriptions\ 2. Open 'eid_config.lua' with any texteditor 3. Edit the Config 4. Save the file 5. Play the game
[b]Linux / Ubuntu [/b] Same as aboth but the path is: /home/%YourUsernameHere%/.steam/steam/steamapps/workshop/content/250900/836319872
[img]https://i.imgur.com/CywNd0N.png[/img] https://moddingofisaac.com/mod/1079/external-item-descriptions
